name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C)
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Cream butter and sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs and vanilla
Gradually add flour mixture
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons on ungreased baking sheets
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes, then transfer to wire rack

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package directions
Cook bacon in large skillet until crispy
Add garlic to bacon, cook 1 minute
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl
Drain pasta, reserve 1 cup pasta water
Add hot pasta to bacon pan
Remove from heat, quickly stir in egg mixture
Add pasta water if needed for creaminess
Season with salt and pepper
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately

name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast bread slices until golden brown
Mash avocado in a bowl
Add salt, pepper, and lemon juice to avocado
Mix well to combine
Spread avocado mixture on toast
Drizzle with olive oil
Top with cherry tomatoes
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes
Add feta cheese if desired
Serve immediately

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: Season and grill chicken breasts until cooked through
Let chicken rest, then slice into strips
Wash and chop romaine lettuce
Place lettuce in large salad bowl
Add Caesar dressing and toss to coat
Add grilled chicken on top
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese
Add croutons for crunch
Drizzle with lemon juice
Season with salt and pepper to taste

name: Homemade Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475째F (245째C)
Roll out pizza dough on floured surface
Transfer dough to pizza pan or baking sheet
Brush edges with olive oil
Spread pizza sauce evenly over dough
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top
Add pepperoni, mushrooms, and bell peppers
Season with Italian seasoning and salt
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden
Let cool for 2 minutes before slicing
